description: This file defines a LightningJS component called 'RatingStars' that renders a 5-star rating visualization along with a count label. It computes the number of full, half, and empty stars based on a 'value' prop and displays them graphically.

classes.name: RatingStars
classes.description: A LightningJS component for displaying star-based ratings with a count label.

methods.name: safeValue
methods.description: Ensures the rating value is between 0 and 5.

methods.name: fullStars
methods.description: Calculates the number of full stars to display.

methods.name: halfStar
methods.description: Determines if a half star should be displayed based on the rating value.

methods.name: emptyStars
methods.description: Calculates how many empty stars to complete the total of five stars.

methods.name: label
methods.description: Generates the label string showing the rating value and count.
